NEMS_Standard: Turbidity
Notes: NEMS is inconsistent/unclear regarding the accuracy criteria for QC400-500 split, and the requirement for turbidities greater than 750.  This code implements an interpretation rather than what is contained in the NEMS flowchart.  The NEMS summary table is silent on the maximum recording interval allowed for catchments over 25km2, but the text states 5 minute intervals for all sites.

NEMS_Standard: Turbidity
Notes: NEMS is inconsistent/unclear regarding the accuracy criteria for QC400-500 split, and the requirement for turbidities greater than 750.  This code implements an interpretation rather than what is contained in the NEMS flowchart.  The NEMS summary table is silent on the maximum recording interval allowed for catchments over 25km2, but the text states 5 minute intervals for all sites.

NEMS_Standard: Turbidity
Notes: NEMS is inconsistent/unclear regarding the accuracy criteria for QC400-500 split, and the requirement for turbidities greater than 750 (no accuracy requirements were added to this band so any results in this band will be classed as unknown).  This code implements an interpretation rather than what is contained in the NEMS flowchart.  The NEMS summary table is silent on the maximum recording interval allowed for catchments over 25km2, but the text states 5 minute intervals for all sites.
